TestCase.name: testSingleCall
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testLiteralPlusTableSelect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT 'foo', func1(a) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[_UTF-16LE'foo'], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=['foo' AS EXPR$0, f0 AS EXPR$1]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldPlusTableSelect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, func1(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS EXPR$1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testTwoCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a), func1(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)], EXPR$1=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
AsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, func1(a) AS EXPR$1]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFourCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a), func2(a), func1(a), func2(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)], EXPR$1=[func2($0)], EXPR$2=[func1($0)], EXPR$3=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, f00 AS EXPR$1, f01 AS EXPR$2, func2(a) AS EXPR$3]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, f00, a, func1(a) AS f01]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, a, func2(a) AS f00]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testNestedCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func1(func1(a))) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func1(func1($0)))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS EXPR$0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS f0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testThreeNestedCalls
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func1(a)), func1(func1(func1(a))), func1(a) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func1($0))], EXPR$1=[func1(func1(func1($0)))], EXPR$2=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, func1(f1) AS EXPR$1, f2 AS EXPR$2]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f2, f0, func1(f1) AS f1]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f2, f1, func1(f0) AS f0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, f00 AS f1, func1(a) AS f2]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[f0, a, func1(a) AS f00]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPassedToOtherUDF
TestCase.Resource: SELECT Concat(func2(a), 'foo') from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[CONCAT(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'foo')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[CONCAT(f0, 'foo') AS EXPR$0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testJustCall
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(1)
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(1)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func1(1) AS EXPR$0]) +- Values(tuples=[[{ 0 }]])

TestCase.name: testWhereCondition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable where REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)')
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionAndProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func2(a) from MyTable where REGEXP(func2(a), 'val (2|3)')
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'val (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionWithInts
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable where func1(a) >= 12
LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=(func1($0), 12)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a], where=[>=(f0, 12)]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggregate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, func3(count(*)) from MyTable group by a
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[func3($1)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[a, func3($f1) AS EXPR$1]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, COUNT(*) AS $f1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectCallWithIntArray
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func4(d) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func4($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
AsyncCalc(select=[func4(d) AS EXPR$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldAccessAfter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func5(a).f0 from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func5($0).f0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[f0.f0 AS EXPR$0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func5(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testFieldOperand
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(func5(a).f0) from MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1(func5($0).f0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(f0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Calc(select=[f0.f0 AS f0]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func5(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON func2(a) = func2(a2) AND REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|4)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($4, $9), REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|4)'))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func2($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS $f4]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|4)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a2) AS $f4]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncInWhere
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2 WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'val (2|3)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'val (2|3)')]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func2(a2) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON func1(a) = func1(a2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a, a2]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, a2, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS $f4]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func1(a2) AS $f4]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithFuncInWhere
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2 WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable RIGHT JOIN MyTable2 ON func1(a) = func1(a2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a, a2]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, a2, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS $f4]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func1(a2) AS $f4]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testProjectCallInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT blah FROM (SELECT func2(a) as blah from MyTable) WHERE REGEXP(blah, 'string (2|3)')

LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP($0, _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalProject(blah=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS blah]) +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionCallInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT blah FROM (select a as blah from MyTable WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)'))

LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereNotInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) FROM MyTable where a not in (select a2 from MyTable2)

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[OR(IS NULL(a), IS NULL(a2), =(a, a2))], select=[a], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[single]) : +- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])
